projects.title: SECUDRIVE (Mobile App)
projects.coreConcept: A high-end, dual-mode ride-sharing platform for car and motorcycle transport.
detailedPoints: Designed and implemented a cross-platform mobile architecture using Flutter and Dart, ensuring a seamless 60FPS experience on both iOS and Android.
Developed a real-time price negotiation engine, allowing dynamic interaction between passengers and drivers to find market-fair rates.
Integrated Google Maps SDK for real-time geolocation tracking, optimized route calculation, and geofencing.
Engineered a secure backend with Firebase, utilizing Cloud Firestore for real-time synchronization and Firebase Auth for multi-factor user verification.

projects.title: LEGAL DIGITALIZATION ECOSYSTEM (Public Administration)
detailedPoints: Spearheaded the technical roadmap for a mission-critical platform digitizing legal procedures within a high-security government sector.
Architected a secure document management system that transitioned physical file processing to a 100% digital workflow, significantly reducing administrative overhead.
Implemented strict RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) and encryption protocols to guarantee the absolute confidentiality of citizen data.
Bridged complex legal requirements with technical specifications, acting as the Lead Business Analyst and Developer.

projects.title: ADVANCED API INFRASTRUCTURE (Brink's Morocco)
detailedPoints: Engineered a high-availability API Gateway using a hybrid of RESTful and GraphQL architectures to facilitate seamless communication between heterogeneous financial services.
Refactored legacy SQL queries and implemented server-side caching strategies, resulting in a 40% reduction in database latency for critical financial logs.
Developed advanced authentication and encryption layers to secure sensitive data exchange across the Brink's network.

projects.title: INDUSTRIAL UX & DATA VISUALIZATION (OCP Group)
detailedPoints: Designed and deployed intuitive industrial dashboards for one of the world's largest phosphate exporters, optimizing for high-pressure environments.
Ensured 100% cross-device compatibility (Desktop, Tablet, Mobile) using Tailwind CSS and custom responsive breakpoints.
Translated complex industrial KPIs into actionable, visual data representations, improving operational decision-making speed.

projects.title: THE CONFIDENTIAL VAULT (NDA-Protected)
detailedPoints: Beyond this showcase, I have architected several high-stakes solutions within the Fintech and Governmental sectors that are protected under strict Non-Disclosure Agreements.

These projects involve deep-tier security frameworks, proprietary algorithms, and enterprise-grade scalability. While the source code is private, I can discuss the architectural logic and security philosophies applied to these systems during a technical interview.
